titles.title: Take Time To Be Holy (familiar easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take time to be holy Speak oft with thy Lord Abide in Him always And feed on His Word Make friends with God's children Help those who are weak Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take time to be holy The world rushes on Spend much time in secret With Jesus alone By looking to Jesus Like Him thou shalt be Thy friends in thy conduct His likeness shall see{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take time to be holy Let Him be thy Guide And run not before Him Whatever betide In joy or in sorrow Still follow thy Lord And looking to Jesus Still trust in His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take time to be holy Be calm in thy soul Each tho't and each temper Beneath His control Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love Thou soon shall be fitted For service above{/lang-eng}
